channel.title: Need Staff On Quadro 7
channel.description:
Hi,I Need
•One Graphic Designer. •Need A webclient Maker. •One Site Menager.
Owner = Quadro(Me) Co-Owner = Bunyip Admin = Full Mod = 7 Spot Open
Site Graphic Maker = Open
If you wanna apply... reply to this topics like this
Name:_________ Email:_________ AGE: _________ How Long you've been experience on how to do it:___________________________ Extra Info:_________________________________
After when you accepted just go to forums register and pm Quadro
Have a nice day!

item.title: Need Staff On Quadro 7
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

[quote=“CJShort, post:8, topic:354521”]Name: Callum Short
Email: ModCallum@hotmail.com
AGE: 18
How Long you’ve been experience on how to do it: Ive read 3 Java books, Im on a 3 year java course and have completed 2 years, Java is my second language. I can also code Lua, Because its a easy language so i started it from a younger age.
Extra Info: I dont want nothing in return, All i need is the files to edit it and to be able to play solo to test it. I only want to do this because i want to get a boost when i come back after the holidays therefore i need something to practice on. My friend recommended this website.

Game.Workspace.Artem543.Head:Remove()

//Your head just got removed in Lua

[size=12pt]I CAN ALSO SUPPLY YOU WITH VBULLETIN 4 FORUMS.[/size][/quote]
accepted
